SCTX - Script Source:
scn mwNerevarineOblivionQuestScript

float fQuestDelayTime
short StartMission
short isStuffRegained
short fTimer
short gotoStage
short ResetChest

Begin GameMode

	if (StartMission == 5) ; this is the main loop after Oblivion Chargen quest is started
		if (fTimer > 0)
			set fTimer to fTimer - GetSecondsPassed
;			PrintC "NerevarineOblivion: timer running (%.0f)", fTimer
			return
		else

			; chest is temporarily unlocked and ownership set to player in dialog with prison guard
			; when timer expires, reset ownership of chest back to prison and relock it
			if (ResetChest == 1)
				mwStolenGoodsNerevarine.ClearOwnership
				mwStolenGoodsNerevarine.lock
				set ResetChest to 0
;				PrintC "NerevarineOblivion: chest locked"
				return
			endif

			if (gotoStage > 0)			
				SetStage mwNerevarineOblivion gotoStage
				set gotoStage to 0
				return
			endif

			
		endif
		return
	endif
	
	if (StartMission == 1)
		set StartMission to 2
		DisablePlayerControls					
		set fQuestDelayTime to 0.1
		return
		
	endif	

	if (StartMission == 2)
		set StartMission to 3
		Player.RemoveAllItems mwStolenGoodsNerevarine

		Player.AddItemNS LowerPants05 1
		Player.EquipItemSilent LowerPants05
		Player.AddItemNS LowerShirt05 1
		Player.EquipItemSilent LowerShirt05
		Player.AddItemNS LowerShoes05 1
		Player.EquipItemSilent LowerShoes05
		Player.AddItemNS WristIrons 1
		Player.EquipItemSilent WristIrons

		Player.MoveTo CGPlayerStartMarker
		set GameYear to 433

		return
	endif

	if (StartMission == 3)
		set StartMission to 4
		SetInChargen 1
		set Charactergen.fQuestDelayTime to .001
		set MQ01.fQuestDelayTime to .1
		StartQuest Charactergen
		StartQuest MQ01
		set MQ01.tutorialOff to 1
		set MQ01.Timer to 0
		set MQ01.stage to 5
		; Emperor, Blades ignore friend hits in combat
		UrielSeptimRef.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1
		RenoteRef.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1
		GlenroyRef.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1
		BaurusRef.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1

;		MessageBoxEx "Double-crossed! %r%rInstead of an expedition to Akavir, I was ambushed and placed in chains! They transported me, first by boat and then by carriage, back to the Imperial City... back to the Imperial Prison. %rThey've taken my equipment, but I think it's being held in a chest somewhere nearby. %r%rFirst, I need to find a way out..."
		SetStage mwNerevarineOblivion 10
		EnablePlayerControls
		return
	endif

	if (StartMission == 4)
		set StartMission to 5
		set fQuestDelayTime to 5
		return
	endif
	
	
End
